data.name: AccessDenied
data.value: Your credential does not hold permissions to access this information.

data.name: AccountActivationError
data.value:
Your account activation process has not been completed due to the following error: [error]

Please contact our system administrators at: [mail] for assistance.

data.name: AccountActivationSuccessful
data.value:
Your account registration process has been successfully completed. Your EcoCyclus account is now active.

You can proceed to the EcoCyclus site and log in.

data.name: AccountRecoveryError
data.value:
Your password recovery process has not been completed due to the following error: [error]

Please contact our system administrators at: [mail] for assistance.

data.value: Please enter your EcoCyclus account email address in order to recover your password.

data.name: AccountRecoverySuccessful
data.value: The recovery process has been successfully started. Please check your email to reset your password.

Please contact our system administrators at: [mail] for assistance.

data.value:
Your password reset process has been successfully completed.

You can proceed to the EcoCyclus site and log in.
